org.fest.swing.junit
Class ReportTransformer

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.optional.junit.AggregateTransformer
      org.fest.swing.junit.ReportTransformer

public class ReportTransformer
extends org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.optional.junit.AggregateTransformer

Transform a JUnit xml report. The default transformation generates an HTML report in either framed or non-framed style.

Author:
Alex Ruiz
